en.text:
This option is used for requesting a reduction or declaring a dispute.

You will have to provide us with the following information in order for us to assess your request:

* A copy of the traffic notice or notice number (you can find this in the top right corner of traffic notice)

* A detailed request on why you are doing a representation must be provided to the relevant courtâ€™s contact details

Please click the button below for the *contact details* of the Magisterial court your traffic notice was issued in. *Note:* you can find this in â€˜Section Eâ€™ of the actual notice that was issued to you.
